title: Zero Gravity Esports - Recruiting!
body:
Hello everyone, Zero Gravity Esports is currently recruiting experienced and committed LoL players to join our Gold/Platinum team! There are currently 4 available spots including Top, Mid , ADC, and Support. 

If you are interested these are the requirements: Gold 2 - Plat 2 Current rank.
                                                                                     Flexible availability for Scrims/Tournaments/Trainings every week.
                                                                                     Reliable and committed player!
                                                                                     Have to be competitively dedicated! (This isn't a casual thing).

If this is you, feel free to add and message myself IGN: Mortician.
We look forward to hearing from you!                          GLHF!

replies.body:
Hi i am interested, https://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=Hi+Im+Vayn%C3%AA

check out my stats adc main feel free to add me also and talk some more cheers
